ClassDesc: Definitions for working with security logs. Device owner apps can control the logging with @B_android#app#admin#DevicePolicyManager#setSecurityLoggingEnabled_E@. When security logs are enabled, device owner apps receive periodic callbacks from @B_android#app#admin#DeviceAdminReceiver#onSecurityLogsAvailable_E@, at which time new batch of logs can be collected via @B_android#app#admin#DevicePolicyManager#retrieveSecurityLogs_E@. @B_android#app#admin#SecurityLog#SecurityEvent_E@ describes the type and format of security logs being collected.
